title: Support Alistar: Windspeaker's Blessing or Bond of Stone?

replies.body: Depending on your matchup you can go Windspeakers blessing but its not really that good on him as his scaling and base heal isn't that big (it is a good amount of heal but your not building any ap to increase the heal so no point) yeah the amour and mr is good for your team but bond of stone is so good in lane as you stop 6% of damage from adcs. But talking about keystones Thunderlords is very good on him as well you can proc it off q, w and 1 hit of your passive and they can't stop you procing thunder lords. but on alistar support you mainly just want to be a massive wall for your team so bond of stone would be the one you go all the time.
the +5% cdr just before windspeaker's is too big a deal to me.
Legendary Guardian is pretty sick too doe

I think Bond of Stone would be better but I forgot to change masteries for a few matches and had Windspeaker's Blessing and it wasn't that bad. The extra heal is nice ontop of the added armor +mr mini buff.
Yeah that's what I was thinking. Get an Ardent Censer and one E could buff up your entire team Offensively and Defensively
